CatDescriptText: Mr. Lucious Jones, 1714 Buena Vista Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 16, 1957, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that parents should be imprisoned for the unlawful acts of their children (under 18 years of age)?" answer reads: "No, I don't think so. If the children are naughty and you have done everything you can for them, don't look up the parents, but take the children instead."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Lucious Jones wearing hat, eyeglasses, striped shirt, plaid necktie, standing on sidewalk across from American Amoco Gas station
